comment: Version of ~ bj-ceqsalg with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , V ` , removing dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab . Prefer its use over ~ bj-ceqsalg when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
